page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This section covers the mid western part of the Aberdeen urban area extending westwards to open countryside beyond. Within the section there is great variety, from residential areas to open space and farmland.The residential areas range from council estates to prestigious private developments such as those around the great granite hole of Rubislaw quarry. Industry can be large scale as in Mastrick Industrial estate or small scale as in the Hebridean Workshop. The section is rich in public and Community buildings and contains several important Educational Establishments. Outdoor enthusiasts can use the parks, golf courses, Aberdeenshire cricket ground, the Riding School and Rifle range.
